name: Miniworld (ShineZ)
description:
hi this game was made by stangshine and it was first person shooter game and you will play as a cutie fox and try to help the world by destroying alien

CONTROL:

w,a,s,d to move

left shift to sprint

spacebar to jump

hold E to pick up object

click to shoot

Update:

this game is a early access so it might have a update
